chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_25
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
has the ability to find its mother’s breast on its own and to decide when to breastfeed. 
This is called ‘Breast Crawl’, which is helpful to baby as early initiation of breastfeeding is successfully 
established for nutrition, and to the mother as it helps in uterine contraction for faster expulsion of 
placenta, reduce maternal blood loss and prevents anemia. CHO should support the mother to provide 
confidence and direction to baby. 
2. SUPERVISORY
